SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.client.network

Class Client

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am40.client.network.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
AbstractContext
public class Client extends Object implements AbstractContext
Client class is the main class of the client. It manages both the view and the network. It is like a mediator which decide, basing on the current state, what to do.
